Title: Establishes distinctive "POW-MIA" license plates and establishes the "POW-MIA awareness fund"
Summary: Establishes distinctive "POW-MIA" license plates; establishes the "POW-MIA awareness fund" to fund POW-MIA public education and awareness campaigns and veteran services by Rolling Thunder New York chapters and upon approval by the state director of veterans' services.
LawCode: Add ยง404-ff, V & T L; add ยง97-ccc, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing distinctive "POW-MIA" license plates; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the "POW-MIA awareness fund"
